name: Escape from Kettuloch
description:
Originally made in Python as a final for my first semester of computer science, this is Escape from Kettuloch, a dungeon crawling game where you're slowly turning into a fox. 

Why is this happening? How is this happening?

While the game does feature hints for puzzles, a dedicated hint guide and walkthrough are available in the downloads section! If you get stuck, those should be very helpful!

This Twine port is nowhere near as clean as the Python, code wise (if you take a look at the code, it'll probably be abundantly clear that this is my first time using Twine, haha), but it should be 100% playable, and much easier to run.

When you're done playing, I'd find it super helpful if you would fill out some of the questions on this survey that I made.
